SELECT COUNT(A.SN) AS TOT_CNT FROM MBLTN_SYNC A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.MBER_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.SYNC_SJ LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND ( (A.MBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%') OR (A.SYNC_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%') OR (A.SYNC_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'))

SELECT A.SN , A.MBER_ID , A.SYNC_SJ , A.SYNC_CN , CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(A.SYNC_DT, '') IS NULL THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.SYNC_DT, '%Y%m%d') END AS SYNC_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS CREAT_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDT_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS UPDT_DT FROM MBLTN_SYNC A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SN = #{sn}
SELECT CASE WHEN A.CNT = 0 THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT MAX(A.SN) + 1 FROM MBLTN_SYNC A ) END AS SN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(SN) AS CNT FROM MBLTN_SYNC ) A
